VIII.iv.7.A.1.a
.
Basis for Awarding Compensation for Certain Paired Organs or Extremities Under 38 U.S.C. 1160
Compensation is payable under
38 U.S.C. 1160
for disabilities involving certain paired organs or extremities, one service-connected (SC) and the other non-service-connected (NSC), provided the NSC disability is not the result of the Veteran’s own willful misconduct.
References
:  For more information on
special consideration for certain paired organs and extremities, see
38 CFR 3.383
, and
prohibitions against duplication of benefits, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 7.B.1
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 7, Section A - Compensation for Paired Organs or Extremities Under 38 CFR 3.383
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 7, Section A
